translation.en: ♪ Little by little Let's live in the meow ♪
♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
- ♪ Hey, Gabby ♪ - ♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
- ♪ What's the big surprise? ♪ - ♪ Meow, meow ♪
♪ Let's shrink right down and go inside ♪
Oh, hi! Do you want to see my under- the- sea craft project?
translation.es: ¡Hola! ¿Quieren ver mi proyecto de artesanía bajo el mar?

translation.en: It's like an ocean in a box!
translation.es: ¡Es como un océano en una caja!

translation.en: And I even made these little fishies out of pipe cleaners.
translation.es: También hice estos pececitos con limpiapipas.

translation.en: Ah, what a fin- tastic spot for a swim.
translation.es: Qué lugar tan fantástico para nadar.

translation.en: And it can be even better with some…
translation.es: Y puede ser aún mejor con algunas…

translation.en: - ♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪ - Oh! You know what that sound means.
translation.es: - Miau, miau, miau, miau, miau. - Ya saben qué es eso.

translation.en: It's time for a Dollhouse Delivery. Come on!
translation.es: Una entrega para la casa de muñecas. Vamos.

translation.en: Alright. Let's see what our Meow Meow Mailbox has for us today.
translation.es: Muy bien. Vamos a ver qué nos trajo el Buzón Miau Miau.

translation.en: Do you think the surprise inside has something to do with MerCat?
translation.es: ¿Creen que la sorpresa tenga que ver con Gatirena?
Es Gata Sol, la hermana de Gatirena.

translation.en: I've come to share something super special with you.
translation.es: Vine a compartir algo superespecial contigo.

translation.en: Today is the Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid- Lantis.
translation.es: Hoy es la fiesta de la fiesta de sirenas en Siretlantis.

translation.en: All the colorful mermaids are going to be there, and we can ride the mermaid slide.
translation.es: Todas las sirenas de colores irán, y podremos lanzarnos en el tobogán.

translation.en: Oh! You've just got to come. Please, please, please, please, please?
translation.es: Tienes que venir. Por favor, por favor.

translation.en: What do you think? Should we go to the Mermaid Sparkle Party?
translation.es: ¿Qué les parece? ¿Vamos a la fiesta de sirenas?

translation.en: Yay! Okay, go see MerCat. She knows the way.
translation.es: - ¡Sí! - Habla con Gatirena. Ella sabe el camino.

translation.en: Oh! And please tell her to bring her blue crystal.
translation.es: Y dile que lleve su cristal azul. Debemos ir con él.

translation.en: We can't go to the party without it. See you soon.
translation.es: Y dile que lleve su cristal azul. Debemos ir con él. Hasta pronto.

translation.en: We're going to a Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid- Lantis!
translation.es: Iremos a una fiesta de brillos de sirenas en Siretlantis.

translation.en: ♪ A pinch on my left Pinch, pinch on my right ♪
translation.es: Pellizco esta oreja y la otra también.

translation.en: ♪ Grab Pandy's hand and hold on tight! ♪
translation.es: Agarro a Pandy y nos sujetamos fuerte.

translation.en: Yoo- hoo! I'm over here, in the bathroom.

translation.es: Bienvenidos a la casa de muñecas.

translation.en: First things first, let's find Pandy.
translation.es: Lo primero es encontrar a Pandy.

translation.en: Will you ever run out of hug attacks, Pandy?
translation.es: ¿Nunca se te acaban los ataques de abrazos?

translation.en: Nope, because hug attacks are my thing.
translation.es: No, porque lo mío es abrazar.

translation.en: - Who's ready for a Mermaid Sparkle Party? - We are!
translation.es: ¿Quién está listo para ir a la fiesta de sirenas? ¡Nosotros!

translation.en: I never say no to a mermaid party.
translation.es: Nunca me niego a ir una fiesta de sirenas.

translation.en: Oh, MerCat, SunnyCat said to make sure you bring your…
translation.es: Gatirena, Gata Sol dijo que tienes que llevar tu…

translation.en: My crystal! Thanks for reminding me.
We're gonna need this to get to the party.
There's nothing better than the fresh sea air.
translation.es: No hay nada mejor que el aire fresco del mar.

translation.en: Except maybe fresh sea air and a smoothie.
translation.es: Salvo el aire fresco del mar y un batido.

translation.en: So, MerCat, how do we get to Mermaid- Lantis?
The first thing we have to do
is look for the rainbow bubbles coming up from the water.
translation.es: las burbujas de arcoíris que salen del agua.

translation.en: Tell me when you see the rainbow bubbles.
Whoa! Here comes a really big one.
She sure knows how to make an entrance.
translation.es: Ella sí sabe hacer una entrada triunfal.
Ella sí sabe hacer una entrada triunfal. ¡Gata Sol!

translation.en: Are you ready to see the magical world of Mermaid- Lantis?
translation.es: ¿Están listos para ver el mundo mágico de Siretlantis?

translation.en: Then it's time to get your mermaid on.
translation.es: Pues es hora de ponerse en plan sirena.

translation.en: - You mean we're going to become mermaids? -
translation.es: ¿Te refieres a que vamos a convertirnos en sirenas?

translation.en: And every mermaid needs three important things.
translation.es: Y toda sirena necesita tres cosas importantes.

translation.en: Now you just dive under the bubbles to get your fin.
translation.es: Sumérjanse debajo de las burbujas y busquen las aletas.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm a real mermaid.
translation.es: No puedo creer que soy una sirena.

translation.en: Ooh! I love your pink ears.
I think this calls for a fishtail five.
Now that you have your fins…
you just need to find your sparkle within.
translation.es: solo les falta encontrar su brillo interior.

translation.en: Um… Where do we look for that?
Your sparkle within is that special thing that makes you happy.
translation.es: El brillo interior es esa cosa especial que te hace feliz.

translation.en: What makes you sparkle, Gabby- Gabby?
Oh! I know. Doing my pinch- pinch always makes me feel happy.
translation.es: Ya sé. Cantar la canción del pellizco siempre me hace feliz.

translation.en: What special thing makes you feel happy?
translation.es: ¿Qué cosa especial te hace sentir feliz?

translation.en: I know! Hugs are definitely my thing.
translation.es: Ya sé. Los abrazos me hacen muy feliz.

translation.en: What's something that makes you really happy?
translation.es: ¿Y qué los hace a ustedes muy felices?

translation.en: Okay, mermaids, it's off to Mermaid- Lantis we go.
translation.es: Y bien, sirenas, nos vamos a Siretlantis.

translation.en: Look at all those glowing houses.
That's where all the mermaids live.
Okay, then. We can take the rainbow slide.
translation.es: Podemos lanzarnos por la resbaladilla arcoíris.

translation.en: MerCat, did you bring your crystal?
- Now, hop on, and let's slide! - Whoo!
♪ Catch a ride on a rainbow slide ♪
♪ Through ponds and lagoons ♪ ♪ We'll zip and zoom ♪
translation.es: Por estanques y lagunas a toda velocidad.

translation.en: - A spa! Let's do our hair! -
♪ The homemade mermaid cakes Are tasty- licious ♪
translation.es: Los pasteles caseros de sirena son deliciosos.

translation.en: ♪ Have you ever seen anything Quite as cute as this is? ♪
translation.es: ¿Habían visto algo tan bonito como esto?

translation.en: ♪ And the mermaids sing this tune ♪
- ♪ Mermaid- Lantis ♪ - ♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
translation.es: - Siretlantis. - Miau, miau, miau, miau, miau, miau.

translation.en: - ♪ Mermaid- Lantis ♪ - ♪ Meow, meow, meow, meow, meow, meow ♪
translation.es: - Siretlantis. - Miau, miau, miau, miau, miau, miau.

translation.en: Wow! This rainbow slide is paw- tastic!
And it's the only way to get here,
translation.es: Y es la única manera de llegar aquí,
al escenario de las sirenas brillantes.

translation.en: Is this where the Sparkle Party is happening?
This is where everyone will get to share that special thing that makes them happy.
translation.es: Aquí todos podrán compartir esa cosa especial que los hace felices.

translation.en: I can't wait to see everyone's sparkle.
translation.es: Me muero por ver el brillo de todos.

translation.en: Everyone has their special sparkle except me.
translation.es: Todos tienen su brillo especial, menos yo.

translation.en: Nothing special about ol' Kitty Squiddy.
translation.es: El viejo Pulpigato no tiene nada especial.

translation.en: I wish there was a way to stop this whole Sparkle Party from happening.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera una manera de detener esta fiesta de brillos de sirenas.

translation.en: Everybody will be sliding down this rainbow soon.
translation.es: Todo el mundo se lanzará por este arcoíris.

translation.en: Good thing we have our crystals, because without these crystals,
translation.es: Menos mal que tenemos los cristales porque, sin ellos,

translation.en: - Sunny, come check out these Sea Sponges. -
translation.es: Gata Sol, ven a ver estas esponjas de mar.

translation.en: Hey! If I take those crystals…
Poof! No more rainbow, no more party.
A scoodley, a doodley, a doo.
Uh- oh! Someone took the crystals.
Sorry, mermaids, but it looks like the Sparkle Party is…
translation.es: Lo siento, sirenas, pero parece que la fiesta de sirenas

translation.en: If we can get those crystals back,
we can bring back the rainbow and save the Mermaid Sparkle Party.
translation.es: traeremos el arcoíris y salvaremos la fiesta de sirenas.

translation.en: Yeah! I didn't get all my mermaid on for nothing.
translation.es: Sí. No me disfracé de sirena para nada.

translation.en: Well, I do know the way to Kitty Squiddy's cave.
translation.es: Yo conozco el camino a la cueva de Pulpigato.

translation.en: Great! Let's go talk to him and figure out what's going on.
translation.es: Vamos a hablar con él y ver qué está pasando.

translation.en: - Scoodley- doodley- doo! - Look! There's Kitty Squiddy.
♪ No Sparkle Party for me ♪ ♪ Tee- hee! ♪
translation.es: No habrá fiesta para mí. ¡Ji, ji!

translation.en: Meowzers! He sure does like to dance.
And he's definitely got some moves.
translation.es: Y definitivamente se mueve muy bien.

translation.en: Well, moves or no moves, we need those crystals back.
translation.es: Pues aunque baile bien, necesitamos esos cristales.

translation.en: ♪ A scoop- scat- scoodley- doodley- doo Yeah! ♪
Alright, Kitty Squiddy, hand them over.
Hmph! Nope. Sorry. Not gonna happen.
translation.es: No. Lo siento. No se los entregaré.

translation.en: But we need them so everyone can get to the Sparkle Party.
translation.es: Los necesitamos para ir a la fiesta de sirenas.

translation.en: Don't you want to show everyone your special sparkle?
translation.es: ¿No quieres mostrarles tu brillo a todos?

translation.en: Everyone has their special thing except me.
translation.es: Todo el mundo tiene su brillo especial, menos yo.

translation.en: Sorry, mermaids, but no crystals and no Sparkle Party.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero no les daré los cristales y no habrá fiesta.

translation.en: And to make extra sure the party doesn't happen…
translation.es: Y para asegurarme aún más de que no haya fiesta…

translation.en: You'll never figure out my picture locks.
translation.es: Nunca descubrirán la combinación del candado.

translation.en: Thanks to these locks, we'll never get out.
translation.es: Gracias a estas cerraduras, nunca saldremos.

translation.en: Come on, Pandy. We can't get out yet.
translation.es: Vamos, Pandy. No podemos salir todavía.

translation.en: The pictures on this lock are in a pattern.
translation.es: Las imágenes del candado tienen un patrón.

translation.en: I bet that if we can figure out what pictures go in these three spots,
translation.es: Si averiguamos qué imágenes van en estos tres lugares,

translation.en: the bars will open right up.
Let's start at the beginning. The pattern goes
translation.es: Empecemos por el principio. El patrón es así:
galleta de mar, estrella de mar, coral marino, coral marino.
Galleta de mar, estrella de mar, coral marino, coral marino.

translation.en: Fin- tastic job figuring out that pattern.
translation.es: Fantástico trabajo haber descubierto el patrón.

translation.en: Okay, everybody, let's go save the Mermaid Sparkle Party!
translation.es: Y ahora, vamos a salvar la fiesta de sirenas.

translation.en: ♪ No one can show off their sparkle now ♪
translation.es: Ahora nadie podrá mostrar su brillo.

translation.en: That Kitty Squiddy really loves to dance.
Dancing is Kitty Squiddy's sparkle. Look how happy it makes him.
translation.es: Bailar es el brillo de Pulpigato. Mira qué feliz se pone.

translation.en: ♪ Kittly- squiddley- doo- doo- doo It's kittly- squiddley- doo ♪
- - Wait! Kitty Squiddy, you have to come to the party and show everyone your sparkle.
translation.es: Espera. Pulpigato, tienes que venir a la fiesta y mostrar tu brillo.

translation.en: Pfft! I already told you, I don't have one.
translation.es: Ya te dije que no tengo brillo.

translation.en: Isn't there something you do that makes you feel really happy?
translation.es: ¿No hay algo que te haga sentir muy feliz cuando lo haces?

translation.en: I'm sorry I took your crystals.
Can I help you put them back?
Do you want to put the first one in, Kitty Squiddy?
♪ It's time for a Sparkle Party! ♪
translation.es: ¡Es hora de la fiesta de sirenas!

translation.en: since you've returned the crystals and you found your special sparkle,
translation.es: como devolviste los cristales y encontraste tu brillo especial,

translation.en: how would you like to be our guest of honor at the party?
translation.es: ¿te gustaría ser nuestro invitado de honor en la fiesta?

translation.en: Well, then it's time to get your mermaid on!
translation.es: Entonces es hora de disfrazarte de sirena.

translation.en: ♪ Scoop- scoop- scooda- doodle- diddle- dee Scoop- to- the- doop- to- the- diddly- dee ♪
translation.es: Pulpi, pulpigatito. Pulpi, pulpigatito. ¡Yo soy Pulpigatito!

translation.en: And you've definitely got your happy grin.
translation.es: Y tienes tu sonrisa de felicidad.

translation.en: You just need your fin and you'll be an honorary mermaid.
translation.es: Solo necesitas una aleta para ser un hombre sirena honorario.

translation.en: Good thing I brought my Fin- tastic Travel Bubbles.
translation.es: Menos mal que traje mis burbujas de sirena.

translation.en: Are you ready for that fin?
Wait. A fin will cover up my legs.
translation.es: Esperen. Esa aleta me tapará las piernas

translation.en: Then I won't be able to do my tentacle- tastic dance moves.
translation.es: y no podré hacer mis tentásticos movimientos.
Un sombrero de aleta de sirena.

translation.en: We helped Kitty Squiddy find his sparkle.
translation.es: Ayudamos a Pulpigato a encontrar su brillo.
Es hora de la fiesta de sirenas.
A celebrar, a celebrar, a celebrar.

translation.en: ♪ Let's talk about yours and mine ♪
translation.es: Hablemos del tuyo y del mío.

translation.en: - ♪ Gonna let it shine ♪ - ♪ Gonna let it shine ♪
translation.es: - Deja que brille. - Deja que brille.

translation.en: ♪ Watch me dancing like a champion ♪
translation.es: Miren cómo bailo como un campeón.

translation.en: ♪ My Squiddy- licious slide never fails ♪
translation.es: Mi baile de pulpo nunca falla.

translation.en: ♪ That makes you want to shake your tail ♪
translation.es: que le hace menear la cola.

translation.en: ♪ Celebrate your sparkle ♪ ♪ Let's talk about yours and mine ♪
translation.es: Celebra tu brillo. Hablemos del tuyo y del mío.

translation.en: ♪ Oh, these are all so great Let's celebrate ♪
translation.es: Todos son geniales, vamos a celebrar.
Todos son geniales, vamos a celebrar. - Celebrar. - Celebrar.

translation.en: I think that was our most mer- mazing adventure yet.
translation.es: Creo que esta ha sido nuestra aventura más asombrosa.

translation.en: Thanks for helping us get the crystals back and helping Kitty Squiddy find his sparkle.
translation.es: Gracias por ayudarnos y por ayudar a Pulpigato a encontrar su brillo.

translation.en: Are you ready for one more surprise?
♪ Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat Gabby Cat, Gabby Cat ♪
Do you know what word I really, really love?
Yes, I love Pandy very much.
translation.es: Sí, yo quiero mucho a Pandy.

translation.en: But I'm talking about the word yet.
translation.es: Pero me refiero a la palabra todavía.

translation.en: - ♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
- ♪ I may not have the answer ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪ ♪ That's something I won't forget ♪
translation.es: Nunca digo nunca porque puedo mejorar, y eso no lo olvidaré.

translation.en: ♪ I don't know how to surf yet ♪
♪ Gotta dip my toe in first ♪
♪ Then gotta learn how to swim To begin this journey ♪
translation.es: y aprender a nadar para empezar.

translation.en: ♪ But soon I'll be hangin' ten! ♪
♪ My cooking's less than perfect ♪ ♪ But I know that snack time's worth it ♪
translation.es: Aún no cocino bien, pero la hora de la merienda vale la pena.

translation.en: ♪ So even if I make a sticky mess I'm gonna do my best to get better ♪
translation.es: Aunque haga un desastre, haré lo posible para mejorar.
y no me voy a rendir.

translation.en: ♪ No need to feel low down ♪
♪ Just give it a go now ♪
♪ Pretty soon you're gonna know how ♪
♪ Just keep going and going, whoo! ♪
translation.es: Solo tienes que seguir e insistir.

translation.en: - ♪ I don't know how to ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
- ♪ I may not have the answer ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪ ♪ That's something we won't forget ♪
translation.es: Nunca digo nunca porque puedo mejorar, y eso no lo olvidaremos.

translation.en: ♪ My court game's not quite magic ♪
♪ Either with a racket or with a basket ♪
♪ Right now it seems more like a chore But if I keep going I know I can score ♪
translation.es: Ahora me cuesta mucho, pero si sigo, sé que podré anotar.

translation.en: ♪ In the craft room it can get messy ♪
translation.es: Hacer manualidades no es nada fácil,

translation.en: ♪ But with more glitter and glue ♪
♪ I can do hard things With you and my besties ♪
translation.es: puedo hacer cosas difíciles con mis amigos.
y no me voy a rendir.

translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna satisfy my soul Gonna reach that goal! ♪
translation.es: Voy a satisfacer mi alma. ¡Voy a alcanzar esa meta!

translation.en: - ♪ No need to feel low down ♪ - ♪ Come on! ♪
- ♪ Give it a go now ♪ - ♪ You got this! ♪
- ♪ Pretty soon you're gonna know how ♪ - ♪ Come on! ♪
- ♪ Just keep going and going ♪ - ♪ Whoo! ♪
translation.es: Solo tienes que seguir e insistir.

translation.en: - ♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
- ♪ I may not have the answer ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.es: Nunca digo nunca porque puedo mejorar,

translation.en: - ♪ Don't know how to do this ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
- ♪ I may not have the answer ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪
translation.es: Nunca digo nunca porque puedo mejorar,

translation.en: - ♪ I don't know how to do this ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
- ♪ I may not have the answer ♪ - ♪ Yet! ♪
♪ But I never say never I can always get better ♪ ♪ That's something we won't forget ♪
translation.es: Nunca digo nunca porque puedo mejorar, y eso nunca lo olvidaremos.

translation.en: And I love my mermaid ears. You know what else I love?
translation.es: Y me encantan mis orejas de sirena. ¿Saben qué más me gusta?

translation.en: Come back next time and we'll open up another Dollhouse Surprise.
translation.es: Vuelvan la próxima vez y abriremos otra sorpresa.
